Agents.Zombie

Class ZombieAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agents.Base.BaseAgent<ZombiePerceptions,ZombieAction>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent

    public class ZombieAgent
extends BaseAgent<ZombiePerceptions,ZombieAction>
    This class represents a zombie agent in the zombie epidemic environment.
